data_pooled_by_authors_comment: Original survey was spread over 1995 and 1996. Resurvey was in 2006
alpha_grain_comment: mean pond area measured on 44 of the 51 sampled ponds
gamma_bounding_box_comment: area of half the Cheshire county given by the authors
gamma_sum_grains_comment: sum of the areas of the 51 ponds
comment: Extracted from DOI https://doi.org/10.1007/s10531-011-0223-9. Methods: 'We surveyed 51 ponds in northern England in 1995/6 and again in 2006, identifying all macrophytes (167 species) and all macroinvertebrates (221 species, excluding Diptera) to species.[...]The presence and absence of invertebrate species was recorded using standardised sampling methods.' Effort is the number of historical sites that were resurveyed.
